TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler(object sender, DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs)
public delegate void DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs ^ e);
type DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler = delegate of obj * DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 之 **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義委派事件的類別。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 您可以存取事件的類別，藉由指定名為副程式**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案中。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 事件引發之後事件，並用來確保屬性與目前會填入物件。The event is raised after the event and is used to ensure that the property of the current is populated with an object. 您可以使用的屬性物件提供給**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定屬性與目前給自訂物件。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果您未指定的值的屬性期間提供**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定屬性至不包含任何使用者資訊的物件。If you do not specify a value for the property of the supplied during the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the sets the property of the to a object that contains no user information. **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**之後，就會引發事件事件，以及之前事件。The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised after the event and before the event. 如果您有以拒絕或允許存取您的應用程式的使用者名稱而定的區段，修改屬性與目前可能會影響您的應用程式的行為。If you have an section that depends on the user name to deny or allow access to your application, modifying the property of the current can affect the behavior of your application. 務必讓您設定期間的使用者名稱**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件會被視為當組態中指定的區段。Be sure that the user name you set during the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is considered when you specify the section in your configuration. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，以測試是否屬性與目前是`null`。The following code example uses the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to test whether the property of the current is `null`. 如果屬性是`null`，範例集屬性與目前要物件，其中的物件與」 預設值".If the property is `null`, the sample sets the property of the current to a object, where the of the object is a with a value of "default". > [!NOTE] > **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**就會引發事件之前事件。The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised before the event. 如此一來，如果您設定屬性與目前自訂身分識別，它可能會影響您的應用程式的行為。As a result, if you set the property of the current to a custom identity, it can affect the behavior of your application. 例如，如果您使用類別，您會確保只有已驗證的使用者存取您的網站，使用區段，並指定``，此範例會造成被忽略的項目，因為使用者會有一個名稱，其中為"default"。For example, if you are using the class and you are ensuring that only authenticated users have access to your site, by using the section and specifying ``, this sample will cause the element to be ignored, as the user will have a name, which is "default". 相反地，您會指定``以確保只有已驗證的使用者可以存取您的網站。Instead you would specify `` to ensure that only authenticated users can access your site.
